 2015-02702015-02-26,  ,  ,  ,  PMO
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of JEFFREY DAVIDSON of Kingston, Ontario, to be special adviser to the Minister of International Trade, to be known as the Extractive Sector Corporate Social Responsibility Counsellor, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective May 19, 2015.
